channel.title: Hosting off DSL?
channel.description:
ok so i have a friend and i was helping him set up his own server that he can play at his own leisure... i host my servers off utorrent so when i set up his server i used that.... i did everything, had his no-ip running, set his variables etc... then i tried logging on using the silab client with the simple allstar source... and t wouldnt log in.... then he says "when i tried it off internet running on wireless it logged in" he explained how his internet is DSL modem thingy... any ideas how he runs off this ??? is it a different port to 43594 or summut?
thanks in advance... djmorgan92

item.title: Hosting off DSL?
item.dc:creator: @djmorgan92 djmorgan92
